00055 MOVE *CreateElementAni(Mov cod)
00056 {
00057    MOVE *p;
00058 
00059    if ((p = (MOVE *)malloc(sizeof(MOVE))) == (MOVE *)NIL)
00060    {
00061       fprintf(stderr, "CreateElementAni: no memory left!\n");
00062       return((MOVE *)NIL);
00063    }
00064 
00065    if (cod == MovimentoCamera)
00066    {
00067       if ((p->mu.mc = (MOVCAM *)malloc(sizeof(MOVCAM))) == (MOVCAM *)NIL)
00068       {
00069          fprintf(stderr, "AddCamAni: no memory left!\n");
00070          RemElementAni(p);
00071          return((MOVE *)NIL);
00072       }
00073    }
00074    if (cod == MovimentoAxis)
00075    {
00076       if ((p->mu.ma = (MOVAXS *)malloc(sizeof(MOVAXS))) == (MOVAXS *)NIL)
00077       {
00078          fprintf(stderr, "CreateElementAni: no memory left!\n");
00079          RemElementAni(p);
00080          return((MOVE *)NIL);
00081       }
00082    }
00083 
00084    p->tipo = cod;
00085    p->next = (MOVE *)NIL;
00086    return(p);
00087 }
00088 
00089 void AddElementAni(MOVE *e)
00090 {
00091    MOVE *p;
00092 
00093    if (movhead == (MOVE *)NIL)
00094    {
00095       movhead = e;
00096       return;
00097    }
00098    for (p = movhead; p->next; p = p->next)
00099    {
00100       ;
00101    }
00102    p->next = e;
00103    e->next = (MOVE *)NIL;
00104 }
00105 
00106 void RemElementAni(MOVE *p)
00107 {
00108    MOVE *e;
00109 
00110    if (p == movhead)
00111    {
00112       movhead = (MOVE *)NIL;
00113       return;
00114    }
00115    for (e = movhead; e->next != p; e = e->next)
00116    {
00117       ;
00118    }
00119    e->next = (MOVE *)NIL;
00120    free((char *)p);
00121 }

00123 void MSD_AnimationReset(int cod)
00124 {
00125    if (cod == 0)
00126    {
00127       MSD_clearAnimationList();
00128       return;
00129    }
00130    MSD_freeCinemaStructure();
00131 }
00132 
00133 void MSD_clearAnimationList(void)
00134 {
00135    MOVE *p, *aux;
00136 
00137    if (movhead == (MOVE *)NIL)
00138    {
00139       printf("Lista ja esta limpa!\n");
00140       return;
00141    }
00142 
00143    for (p = movhead; p != (MOVE *)NIL;)
00144    {
00145       aux = p;
00146       p   = p->next;
00147       if (aux->tipo == MovimentoCamera)
00148       {
00149          free((char *)aux->mu.mc);
00150       }
00151       if (aux->tipo == MovimentoAxis)
00152       {
00153          free((char *)aux->mu.ma);
00154       }
00155       free((char *)aux);
00156    }
00157    movhead = (MOVE *)NIL;
00158 }
00159 
00160 void PrintListAni(void)
00161 {
00162    MOVE *e;
00163 
00164    if (movhead == (MOVE *)NIL)
00165    {
00166       printf("Lista esta limpa!\n");
00167       return;
00168    }
00169    for (e = movhead; e; e = e->next)
00170    {
00171       if (e->tipo == MovimentoCamera)
00172       {
00173          printf("Movimento de camera. nome: %s scale: %10.4f\n",
00174                 e->mu.mc->cam->cname, e->mu.mc->scale);
00175          printf("posicao final do olho: %10.4f %10.4f %10.4f\n",
00176                 e->mu.mc->eye[0], e->mu.mc->eye[1], e->mu.mc->eye[2]);
00177          printf("posicao final da ref : %10.4f %10.4f %10.4f\n",
00178                 e->mu.mc->ref[0], e->mu.mc->ref[1], e->mu.mc->ref[2]);
00179       }
00180       else
00181       {
00182          printf("Movimento de Eixo. nome: %s  deslocamento: %10.4f \n",
00183                 e->mu.ma->axs->aname, e->mu.ma->desl);
00184       }
00185    }
00186 }
00187 
00188 void InitListAni(int nframes)
00189 {
00190    MOVE *e;
00191 
00192    if (movhead == (MOVE *)NIL)
00193    {
00194       printf("Lista esta limpa!\n");
00195       return;
00196    }
00197    for (e = movhead; e; e = e->next)
00198    {
00199       if (e->tipo == MovimentoCamera)
00200       {
00201          vecminus(e->mu.mc->auxeye, e->mu.mc->eye, e->mu.mc->cam->eye);
00202          vecminus(e->mu.mc->auxref, e->mu.mc->ref, e->mu.mc->cam->ref);
00203          vecesc(e->mu.mc->auxeye, e->mu.mc->auxeye, 1. / (real)nframes);
00204          vecesc(e->mu.mc->auxref, e->mu.mc->auxref, 1. / (real)nframes);
00205          e->mu.mc->scale = (e->mu.mc->scale - e->mu.mc->cam->scale) / nframes;
00206       }
00207       else
00208       {
00209          e->mu.ma->auxdesl = e->mu.ma->desl / nframes;
00210       }
00211    }
00212 }
